name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. In a separate pan, fry the pancetta with garlic. Beat the eggs with Parmesan. Mix everything together with the spaghetti, seasoning with salt and pepper.

name: Classic Pancakes
instructions: Mix the flour, baking powder, and salt. In another bowl, whisk the eggs and milk, then combine with the dry ingredients. Fry portions of the batter in butter until golden brown.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Blend garlic, anchovies, egg yolk, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and lemon juice. Slowly add olive oil while blending. Toss with lettuce, Parmesan, and croutons.
